name: Never Together
description:
After a sudden explosion, two little magnets find themselves forever trapped into a tunnel. Here they get to know each other and eventually fall in love. Unfortunately, they are destined to be apart. That's right! They are incompatible and their union could only harm them!

 Control the two little magnets through their adventure in the tube. Avoid the obstacles and collect as many coins and power-ups as you can!

But be careful! Evil robots, sudden explosions, interferences and much more will make it harder and harder for you to reach the end of each level!

 Will YOU be the one to help these two little magnets overcome their physical incompatibility and start a life together? LET’S PLAY AND SEE!

 Never Together is a 2D platform game developed for the Video game Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano. More information at:

 http://www.polimigamecollective.org
